content.en: Weak Gravitational Lensing: Scientists are exploring various algorithms to address research questions in the field of weak gravitational lensing. These algorithms, such as the lens parallax method, maximum-entropy weak shear mass reconstruction method, and multigrid P3M algorithm, are being used to determine redshifts of galaxies, improve weak lens reconstruction, and tackle computational challenges. Other algorithms, like the Fast particle-mesh cosmological N-body simulation algorithm and Minimum-variance estimator of the 3D matter density distribution, are being employed to detect clusters of galaxies and unfold the matter distribution using three-dimensional weak gravitational lensing.
content.da: Svag gravitationslinse: Forskere udforsker forskellige algoritmer for at adressere forskningsspørgsmål inden for feltet svag gravitationslinse. Disse algoritmer, såsom linselationsmetoden, maksimum-entropi svag forskydningsmasserestrekonstruktionsmetode og multigrid P3M algoritmen, bruges til at bestemme galaksers rødforskydning, forbedre rekonstruktionen af svage linser og tackle beregningsmæssige udfordringer. Andre algoritmer, som den hurtige partikel-mesh kosmologiske N-body simuleringsalgoritme og minimum-varians estimatoren af den tredimensionale materiedensitetsfordeling, anvendes til at detektere galaksehobe og udfolde materiefordelingen ved brug af tredimensionel svag gravitationslinse.
